item.name: Get Token
Get CONSUMER token for accessing an Open Resource
Get CONSUMER token for accessing a Secure Resource
Get CONSUMER token for accessing a Secure Resource Group
Get DELEGATE token for uploading a Resource
Get DELEGATE token for uploading a Resource Group
Get ADMIN token for uploading a Resource/Resource Group
upload
200 (Success) DX file upload - Resource level (sample)
401 (not authorized) DX file upload - Resource level (sample)
200 (Success) DX file upload - Group level (sample)
401 (not authorized) DX file upload - Group level (sample)
200 (Success) DX file upload - Resource level (Archive)
401 (not authorized) DX file upload - Resource level (Archive)
200 (Success) DX file upload - Group level (Archive)
401 (not authorized) DX file upload - Group level (Archive)
400 (No id param in request) DX file upload
400 (Invalid isSample value) DX file upload
200 (Success) DX file upload - Resource level (External Storage)
download
200 (Success) DX file download - RL (Sample file )
400 (invalid file id) DX file download
200 (Success) DX file download - GL (Sample file )
200 (Success) DX file download -Resource level (Archive file )
401 (not authorized) DX file download - RL (Archive file )
401 (not authorized)  DX file download -RL (Archive file )
404 (Not Found) DX file download -Resource level (Archive file )
200 (Success) DX file download -Group level (Archive file )
401 (not authorized) DX file download - GL (Archive file )
404 (Not Found) DX file download -Group level (Archive file )
query
200 (Success) Search for Files of an open resource (using openToken)
200 (Success) Search for Files of an open resource group (using openToken)
200 (Success) Search for Files  of a secure resource (using secureToken)
200 (Success) Search for Files of a secure resource group  (using secureRGToken)
401 (not authorized) Search for Files
200 (Success) Search for Files using Temporal parameters
200 (Success) Search for Files using Spatial [geo(circle)]
200 (Success) Search for Files using Spatial [geo(polygon)]
200 (Success) Complex Search [temporal+geo(Circle) search]
401 (not authorized) Complex Search [temporal+geo(Circle) search]
200 (Success) List metadata of an open resource (using openToken)
200 (Success) List metadata of an open resource group (using openToken)
200 (Success) List metadata of a secure resource (using secureToken)
200 (Success) List metadata of a secure resource group (using secureRGToken)
401 (not authorized) List metadata
delete
200 (Success) DX file delete -RL  (sample file)
404 (Not Found) DX file delete - RL  (sample file)
200 (Success) DX file delete -GL (sample file)
200 (Success) DX file delete - RL  (Archive file)
404 (Not Found) DX file delete - RL (Archive file)
200 (Success) DX file delete - GL (Archive file)
404 (Not Found) IUDX file delete - GL (Archive file)
200 (Success) DX file delete - RL  (External Storage)
